# Quantification 
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```
Test data set containing peak integration data for calibration standards, laboratory and field blanks, and samples. Single analyte. 
TODO double check concentration of IS
```{r message=FALSE}
x <- read_csv("TestData.csv")
IntStdConc <- 5 # ppb
```
Subset calibration standards and generate calibration curve.
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=5}
calibration_data <- x %>% 
  filter(Type == "Cal") %>%
  mutate(calResponseRatio = TargetResponse / IntStdResponse,
         calAmountRatio = ExptConc / IntStdConc)

lm_result <- summary(lm(calibration_data$calResponseRatio ~ calibration_data$calAmountRatio))

calibration_curve <- ggplot(calibration_data, aes(calAmountRatio, calResponseRatio)) +
    #facet_wrap(~) +
    geom_smooth(method = lm, color = "grey", size = 1) +
    geom_point(shape = 21, colour = "red", fill = NA, size = 3, stroke = 1.5) +
    labs(x = 'Amount Ratio (ng/mL)', y = 'Response Ratio') +
    labs(title = 'Calibration Curve, Nicotine (Target/IS)', 
         subtitle = paste('n=', nrow(calibration_data), 
                          ', slope=', signif(lm_result$coefficients[2,1], 3), 
                          ', intercept=', signif(lm_result$coefficients[1,1], 3),
                          ', multiple R-squared=', signif(lm_result$r.squared, 3), sep = '')) +
    geom_rug() +
    theme_bw()
print(calibration_curve)
```
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=5}
calibration_data <- x %>% 
  filter(Type == "Cal") %>%
  mutate(calResponseRatio = TargetResponse / IntStdResponse,
         calAmountRatio = ExptConc / IntStdConc)

lm_result <- summary(lm(calibration_data$calResponseRatio ~ calibration_data$calAmountRatio))

calibration_curve <- ggplot(calibration_data, aes(calAmountRatio, calResponseRatio, label = ExptConc)) +
  #facet_wrap(~) +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, color = "grey", size = 1) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, colour = "red", fill = NA, size = 3, stroke = 1.5) +
  labs(x = 'Amount Ratio (ng/mL)', y = 'Response Ratio') +
  labs(title = 'Log Scale Selection Calibration Curve, Nicotine') +
  geom_rug() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  geom_text(size = 4, color = "red", vjust = -0.5, hjust = 0, nudge_x = -0.5) +
  theme_bw()
print(calibration_curve)
```
